articles.title: Hazine üç ayda 1 trilyon 280 milyar TL borçlanma planlıyor
articles.title_tr: Hazine üç ayda 1 trilyon 280 milyar TL borçlanma planlıyor
articles.summary: Hazine ve Maliye Bakanlığı, Şubat-Nisan döneminde 1 trilyon 539,3 milyar lira iç borç servisine karşı 1 trilyon 280,7 milyar liralık iç borçlanma yapacak. Bu dönemde 18 tahvil ve 2 hazine bonosu ihalesi düzenlenecek, 8 kira sertifikası doğrudan satışa sunulacak.

Dolar ve euroda yükseliş sürerken, yatırım ve emeklilik fonları yatırımcısına kazandırdı. Özellikle “Kıymetli Maden” fonları yüzde 15’in üzerinde getirisiyle dikkat çekti.

articles.title: Ünlülere uyuşturucu soruşturması: Mika Raun gözaltına alındı
articles.title_tr: Ünlülere uyuşturucu soruşturması: Mika Raun gözaltına alındı
articles.summary: Ünlülere yönelik yürütülen uyuşturucu soruşturması çerçevesinde sosyal medya ünlüsü Mika Can Raun gözaltına alındı. Tutuklu bulunan eski futbolcu Ümit Karan, etkin pişmanlık hükümleri çerçevesinde ifade vermek için savcılığa başvurdu. Firari şüpheli Merve Taşkın hakkında da yakalama kararı çıkarıldı.

articles.title: Late bedtimes are linked to higher heart disease risk
articles.title_tr: Late bedtimes are linked to higher heart disease risk
articles.summary: People who naturally stay up late may be putting their hearts under added strain as they age. A large study tracking more than 300,000 adults found that middle-aged and older night owls had poorer overall heart health and a higher risk of heart attack and stroke than those who were active earlier in the day, with the effect especially pronounced in women. Much of this elevated risk appeared to stem from lifestyle factors common among evening types, including smoking and inadequate sleep.
articles.summary_tr: People who naturally stay up late may be putting their hearts under added strain as they age. A large study tracking more than 300,000 adults found that middle-aged and older night owls had poorer overall heart health and a higher risk of heart attack and stroke than those who were active earlier in the day, with the effect especially pronounced in women. Much of this elevated risk appeared to stem from lifestyle factors common among evening types, including smoking and inadequate sleep.
articles.long_summary: People who naturally stay up late may be putting their hearts under added strain as they age. A large study tracking more than 300,000 adults found that middle-aged and older night owls had poorer overall heart health and a higher risk of heart attack and stroke than those who were active earlier in the day, with the effect especially pronounced in women. Much of this elevated risk appeared to stem from lifestyle factors common among evening types, including smoking and inadequate sleep.
articles.long_summary_tr: People who naturally stay up late may be putting their hearts under added strain as they age. A large study tracking more than 300,000 adults found that middle-aged and older night owls had poorer overall heart health and a higher risk of heart attack and stroke than those who were active earlier in the day, with the effect especially pronounced in women. Much of this elevated risk appeared to stem from lifestyle factors common among evening types, including smoking and inadequate sleep.

articles.title: Why An Elder Scrolls TV Show Would Struggle, According To Former Bethesda Dev
articles.title_tr: Why An Elder Scrolls TV Show Would Struggle, According To Former Bethesda Dev
articles.summary: The Fallout TV show based on Bethesda's game franchise is proving popular, prompting some to wonder if another one of the company's franchises, The Elder Scrolls, could get its own show. That remains to be seen, but now former Bethesda designer Bruce Nesmith has said an Elder Scrolls TV show probably would not work.He told Press Box PR (via Insider Gaming) that there is "something very special and different" about Fallout that makes it good fodder for a TV show. On the other hand, The Elder Scrolls is a "standard kind of fantasy" story, and those have been done again and again and again on TV, he said."That's not as interesting, not in this day and age where you already have The Lord Of The Rings movies. We've got Game Of Thrones. You'd have to try to find something to lean into that would be special about it," Nesmith explained.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: The early turning point when men’s heart risk accelerates
articles.title_tr: The early turning point when men’s heart risk accelerates
articles.summary: Men start developing heart disease earlier than women, with risks rising faster beginning around age 35, according to long-term research. The difference is driven mainly by coronary heart disease, not stroke or heart failure. Traditional risk factors explain only part of the gap. The findings suggest earlier screening could help catch problems before serious damage occurs.

articles.title: 'Go Back and Play Morrowind and Tell Me That's the Game You Want to Play Again' — Former Bethesda Veteran Delivers His Verdict on Potential The Elder Scrolls Remasters
articles.title_tr: 'Go Back and Play Morrowind and Tell Me That's the Game You Want to Play Again' — Former Bethesda Veteran Delivers His Verdict on Potential The Elder Scrolls Remasters
articles.summary: A former veteran Bethesda developer has cast doubt on the possibility of a Morrowind remaster in the same vein as the recently released Oblivion remaster, saying going back to play The Elder Scrolls 3 now, over 20 years after it came out, would make fans “cringe.”
articles.summary_tr: A former veteran Bethesda developer has cast doubt on the possibility of a Morrowind remaster in the same vein as the recently released Oblivion remaster, saying going back to play The Elder Scrolls 3 now, over 20 years after it came out, would make fans “cringe.”

articles.title: Breakthrough sepsis drug shows promise in human trial
articles.title_tr: Breakthrough sepsis drug shows promise in human trial
articles.summary: A new drug developed by Australian researchers has shown promising results in reducing sepsis in a Phase II clinical trial involving 180 patients. The carbohydrate-based treatment works by calming a dangerous immune reaction that can cause organ failure. With no specific anti-sepsis therapy currently available, the findings mark a major step forward. Researchers now aim to move into Phase III trials.

articles.summary: Mersin’de gece yarısından itibaren etkili olan şiddetli sağanak yağış, kent genelinde sel ve su taşkınlarına yol açtı. Dere yataklarının taşması sonucu bazı yollar ulaşıma kapanırken, park halindeki ve seyir halindeki araçlar sel sularına kapıldı.

articles.title: Some Of Linux's Biggest Players Are Unifying Their Gaming Efforts
articles.title_tr: Some Of Linux's Biggest Players Are Unifying Their Gaming Efforts
articles.summary: As gaming support on Linux has continued to grow over the past few years several distributions specifically designed around gaming support have become increasingly popular. In order to better serve users going forward, many of them have joined a collective to help focus efforts on better future support and reduce duplicated, time-wasting work.The Open Gaming Collective is being contributed to by some of the most prolific gaming Linux distributions around, including Bazzite, Nobara, PikaOS, Playtron, and more. The aim of the collective is to centralize efforts on core component development, such as updates for input managers (for better controller support), gaming-specific packages (such as Gamescope, which is widely used on SteamOS), and kernel improvements. "This means better hardware compatibility, fewer duplicated efforts, and a more unified Linux gaming experience for everyone," the announcement post concludes.One such improvement includes widespread support for Secure Boot, which currently isn't supported on Bazzite, one of the best SteamOS alternatives. Secure Boot support has steadily become required for kernel-level anti-cheat software used in Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, Battlefield 6, and Highguard, and is a big reason why multiplayer games are still challenging on Linux. While this won't immediately solve the issue, resolving it across multiple Linux distributions at once should make it easier for you to choose one that suits you needs the most rather than being forced into one because of specific feature support.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: 'I Hope We Do This Many Times Over' — Tom Holland's Heartwarming Note to Spider-Man: Brand New Day Crew Revealed
articles.title_tr: 'I Hope We Do This Many Times Over' — Tom Holland's Heartwarming Note to Spider-Man: Brand New Day Crew Revealed
articles.summary: Spider-Man: Brand New Day star Tom Holland has reportedly thanked the film's crew and hinted at working together again on future films, in a handwritten note that's been posted online.

articles.title: Gray wolves are hunting sea otters and no one knows how
articles.title_tr: Gray wolves are hunting sea otters and no one knows how
articles.summary: On a remote Alaskan island, gray wolves are rewriting the rulebook by hunting sea otters — a behavior few scientists ever expected to see. Researchers are now uncovering how these coastal wolves adapted to marine hunting, what it means for land–sea ecosystems, and whether this ancient predator–prey relationship is re-emerging as sea otters recover.

articles.title: Beyond Good And Evil 2 Is Still Happening, Says Ubisoft Creative Director
articles.title_tr: Beyond Good And Evil 2 Is Still Happening, Says Ubisoft Creative Director
articles.summary: Originally announced almost two decades ago, Beyond Good and Evil 2 continues to be in active development. Ubisoft creative director Fawzi Mesmar confirmed that his team is "committed and focused on delivering a remarkable game" on LinkedIn.Spotted by VGC, Mesmar gave the Beyond Good and Evil 2 update after Ubisoft announced more layoffs, studio closures, and the cancellation of the Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time remake. The creative director noted his team and the long-gestating sequel (possibly a prequel) were "unaffected," while at the same time, adding that he was "saddened" by the recent news. This confirms a report last week that Beyond Good and Evil 2 was still in development following the Ubisoft purge.Beyond Good and Evil 2 was officially revealed in 2008, while the original game was released in late 2003. Over the past decade, there have been continual confirmations that progress was being made on the game at Ubisoft, particularly after its re-unveiling in 2017. For example, there was talk of a beta for Beyond Good and Evil 2 coming before the end of 2019 at one point. Then, in 2020, Ubisoft CEO Yves Guillemot claimed the game was "progressing well." However, in 2023, Beyond Good and Evil 2 creative director Emile Morel died at the age of 40.Continue Reading at GameSpot
